title: Leading baby wipes vendors in the U.S. 2016 , based on sales
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Companys.
The Million U.S. dollars is highest at Company Private label and lowest at Company Irish Breeze.
The difference of Million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 490.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Million U.S. dollars 494.4 is found at Company Private label and the minimum is found at Irish Breeze where Company is 4.4.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Private label and lowest at Company Irish Breeze.
Company Kimberly Clark Corp. has the second highest value for Million U.S. dollars.

Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 1235.0.
